document.heading: Omnibus Alcoholic Beverage Regulation Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-270, the “Omnibus Alcoholic Beverage Regulation Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-902. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2014, and December 17, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 26, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-609 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-270 became effective May 2, 2015.
